greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(15).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 1).
formula: a(n) = (1/2)(7 + 5*(-1)^n) - 3*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 11 2009
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 19000); x=contfrac(sqrt(15)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040011.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 03 2009
xref: Cf. A010472 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 03 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
